dict.string: SELECT \ '', \ CONCAT( '?EKey=', E.pk, '&cache=_cache_&institution=_institution_&StudyInstanceUID=', E.study_iuid ) ,\ E.study_custom3, \ IF(PII.entity_id != 'NULL', CONCAT( '?PatientID=', PI.pat_id, '&issuer=', PII.entity_id, '&cache=_cache_&institution=_institution_&max=1000&start=0&length=1000'), CONCAT( '?PatientID=', PI.pat_id,'&cache=_cache_&institution=_institution_&max=1000&start=0&length=1000') ), \ CONCAT( IFNULL( PN.family_name,'' ), '^', IFNULL( PN.given_name,'' ), '^', IFNULL( PN.middle_name,'' ), '^', IFNULL( PN.name_prefix,'' ), '^', IFNULL(PN.name_suffix,'')), \ CONCAT( SUBSTRING(E.study_date,1,4), '-', SUBSTRING(E.study_date,5,2), '-',SUBSTRING(E.study_date,7,2), ' ', SUBSTRING(E.study_time,1,2), ':', SUBSTRING(E.study_time,3,2)), \ EQA.mods_in_study, \ E.study_desc, \ CONCAT(IFNULL(ERN.family_name,''), '^', IFNULL(ERN.given_name,''), '^', IFNULL(ERN.middle_name,''), '^', IFNULL(ERN.name_prefix,''), '^', IFNULL(ERN.name_suffix,'')), \ E.study_custom2, \ PII.entity_id, \ P.pat_birthdate, \ P.pat_sex, \ E.accession_no, \ EAI.entity_id, \ E.study_id, \ E.study_iuid, \ E.study_time, \ E.study_custom1, \ P.pk, \ E.pk, \ '_institution_', \ '_cache_', \ PI.pat_id, \ E.study_date, \ EQA.num_series, \ EQA.num_instances, \ EAI.entity_uid, \ EAI.entity_uid_type \

%@ "\ SELECT \ P.pk, \ PI.pat_id, \ CONCAT(IFNULL(PN.family_name,''), '^', IFNULL(PN.given_name,''), '^', IFNULL(PN.middle_name,''), '^', IFNULL(PN.name_prefix,''), '^', IFNULL(PN.name_suffix,'')), \ PII.entity_id, \ P.pat_birthdate, \ P.pat_sex \ FROM patient AS P \ LEFT JOIN person_name PN ON patient.pat_name_fk=person_name.pk \ LEFT JOIN patient_id PI ON patient.patient_id_fk=patient_id.pk \ LEFT JOIN issuer PII ON patient_id.issuer_fk=issuer.pk \ WHERE P.pk=%@ \ %@ \ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ E.pk, \ E.study_iuid, \ E.study_desc, \ E.study_date, \ E.study_time, \ E.accession_no, \ E.study_id, \ CONCAT(IFNULL(ERF.family_name,''), '^', IFNULL(ERF.given_name,''), '^', IFNULL(ERF.middle_name,''), '^', IFNULL(ERF.name_prefix,''), '^', IFNULL(ERF.name_suffix,'')), \ E.study_custom3, \ EQA.num_series, \ EQA.mods_in_study, \ E.study_custom1, \ E.study_custom2, \ E.study_custom3, \ EAI.entity_id, \ EAI.entity_uid, \ EAI.entity_uid_type \ FROM study AS E\ LEFT JOIN study_query_attrs EQA ON study_query_attrs.study_fk=study.pk \ LEFT JOIN person_name ERN ON study.ref_phys_name_fk=person_name.pk \ LEFT JOIN issuer EAI ON study.accno_issuer_fk=issuer.pk \ WHERE E.pk=%@ \ AND EQA.view_id='hideRejected' \ %@ \ " %@

FROM study AS E \ LEFT JOIN study_query_attrs EQA ON E.pk= EQA.study_fk \ LEFT JOIN issuer EAI ON E.accno_issuer_fk=EAI.pk \ LEFT JOIN person_name ERN ON E.ref_phys_name_fk=ERN.pk \ LEFT JOIN patient P ON E.patient_fk=P.pk \ LEFT JOIN patient_id PI ON P.patient_id_fk=PI.pk \ LEFT JOIN issuer PII ON PI.issuer_fk=PII.pk \ LEFT JOIN person_name PN ON P.pat_name_fk=PN.pk \ WHERE E.rejection_state!=2 \ AND EQA.view_id='hideRejected' \

array.string: AND E.accession_no='%@' AND EAI.entity_uid='@%' AND EAI.entity_uid_type='@%' \
AND E.accession_no='%@' AND EAI.entity_uid='@%' AND EAI.entity_uid_type='@%' AND EAI.entity_id='@%' \

dict.string: %@ "\ SELECT \ series.pk, \ series.series_iuid, \ series.series_desc, \ series.series_no, \ series.modality, \ series.institution, \ series.department, \ series.station_name, \ CONCAT(IFNULL(person_name.family_name,''), '^', IFNULL(person_name.given_name,''), '^', IFNULL(person_name.middle_name,''), '^', IFNULL(person_name.name_prefix,''), '^', IFNULL(person_name.name_suffix,'')), \ series.laterality, \ series_query_attrs.num_instances, \ series.pps_start_date, \ series.pps_start_time \ FROM series \ LEFT JOIN person_name ON series.perf_phys_name_fk=person_name.pk \ LEFT JOIN series_query_attrs ON series.pk=series_query_attrs.series_fk \ WHERE series.study_fk=%@ \ %@ \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ sop_cuid, \ sop_iuid, \ inst_no, \ 0 \ FROM instance \ WHERE series_fk='%@' \ %@ \ %@ \ %@ \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ sop_cuid, \ sop_iuid, \ inst_no, \ 1 \ FROM instance \ WHERE series_fk='%@' \ %@ \ %@ \ %@ \ " %@
%@ "\ SELECT \ pk, \ sop_cuid, \ sop_iuid, \ inst_no, \ num_frames \ FROM instance \ WHERE series_fk='%@' \ %@ \ %@ \ %@ \ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ study.study_iuid, \ series.series_iuid, \ instance.sop_iuid \ FROM instance \ LEFT JOIN series ON series.pk=instance.series_fk LEFT JOIN study ON study.pk=series.study_fk WHERE study.pk='%@' \ AND series.modality='%@' \ AND study.rejection_state!=2 \ AND series.rejection_state!=2 \ AND instance.sop_cuid='1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.104.2' \ ORDER BY instance.created_time DESC \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ study.study_iuid, \ series.series_iuid, \ instance.sop_iuid \ FROM instance \ LEFT JOIN series ON series.pk=instance.series_fk LEFT JOIN study ON study.pk=series.study_fk WHERE study.study_iuid='%@' \ AND series.modality='%@' \ AND study.rejection_state!=2 \ AND series.rejection_state!=2 \ AND instance.sop_cuid='1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.104.2' \ ORDER BY instance.created_time DESC \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@

%@ "\ SELECT \ study.study_iuid, \ series.series_iuid, \ instance.sop_iuid \ FROM instance \ LEFT JOIN series ON series.pk=instance.series_fk LEFT JOIN study ON study.pk=series.study_fk WHERE study.accession_no='%@' \ AND series.modality='%@' \ AND study.rejection_state!=2 \ AND series.rejection_state!=2 \ AND instance.sop_cuid='1.2.840.10008.5.1.4.1.1.104.2' \ ORDER BY instance.created_time DESC \ LIMIT 1; \ " %@
